effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Disintegrate damage increased by 6% and Pyre damage increased by 6%.
(4) Set: Eternity Surge and Shattering Star's cooldowns are decreased by 1.0 sec and Eternity Surge now grants Essence Burst.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,410, further increased by 896 while you remain within its light.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,890 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 181 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 287,392 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,310 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.

name: Loamm Niffen Tabard
description: Give the Niffen a reason to call you smelly.
